actions.name: Download

cost.trigger: At the start of battle, or when switched in.

actions.description:
Trigger: At the start of battle, or when switched in.

Effect: If the targeted creature's DEF stat is higher than its SPDEF, the user raises their SPATK stage by +1 for 5 activations. If the targeted creature's DEF stat is lower than its SPDEF Stat, the user raises their ATK stage by +1 for 5 activations.

system.description:
